title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching perspectives in the Eclipse IDE, the maximized state of a view is lost.
OB: When opening the CVS repository view in the Java perspective and maximizing it by double clicking the title bar, then switching to the resource perspective, and finally returning to the Java perspective, the view is no longer maximized.
EB: The view should remain maximized even after switching perspectives.
SR:
1. Open the Eclipse IDE and switch to the Java perspective.
2. Open the CVS repository view.
3. Double click the title bar of the view to maximize it.
4. Switch to the resource perspective.
5. Return to the Java perspective.
